product_overview: Gen Uprising is a dynamic content platform built with Next.js and Supabase that features curated articles across multiple thematic sections such as Case Files, Signals, and Daughters of Dissent. It offers rich markdown-rendered articles, responsive design, category filtering, and a protected admin panel for content management, all enhanced with smooth animations and dark mode support.
core_goals: Deliver a seamless reading experience with richly formatted articles using markdown.
Enable users to easily navigate and filter content by categories across multiple thematic sections.
Provide a responsive and accessible UI that adapts gracefully from mobile to desktop devices.
Support content creators with a secure, authenticated admin panel for managing articles and audio uploads.
Maintain high performance and smooth animations respecting user motion preferences.
key_features: Responsive navigation bar with active route highlighting and animated mobile menu.
Article listing pages with category filtering supporting AND logic and dynamic loading states.
Detailed article pages with markdown rendering, category badges, and scroll progress indicator.
Multiple thematic sections: Case Files, Signals, Daughters of Dissent, and Hall of Noise 'coming soon' page.
Protected admin panel with password authentication and CRUD operations for article and audio content.
API endpoints integrated with Supabase for fetching and managing articles and audio metadata.
Dark mode support with theme detection and toggle capability.
Framer Motion animations for page transitions, card reveals, and menu interactions with reduced motion support.
user_flow_summary: User lands on Home page, views hero section, and navigates to desired content sections via the navigation bar.
User browses Case Files, Signals, or Daughters of Dissent listing pages, applies category filters to refine articles, and clicks on an article to read details.
User reads an article with full markdown content, observes scroll progress bar, and navigates back or to other articles.
User visits Hall of Noise page to see coming soon messaging and uses links to explore other sections.
Admin user accesses the protected admin panel, authenticates with a password, manages articles (create, update, delete) across sections, and uploads audio files for Hall of Noise.
Users experience consistent UI and animations across devices, with accessibility for reduced motion preferences.
validation_criteria: All navigation links must direct correctly and highlight active routes.
Article lists load data from APIs with accurate category filtering and display appropriate empty or error states.
Article detail pages render markdown elements correctly and show scroll progress.
Admin authentication enforces password verification and restricts data operations to authenticated users.
CRUD actions in admin panel reflect changes immediately in the UI and persist in the database.
Responsive layouts adjust correctly across mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes.
Animations respect user preferences for reduced motion and run smoothly without UI glitches.
API endpoints securely interact with Supabase and handle errors gracefully.

features.name: Navigation Bar
features.description: Responsive navigation with desktop horizontal layout and mobile hamburger menu. Features scroll-based styling, active route highlighting, and animated transitions.

features.name: Article Listing (Article Section Landing)
features.description: Reusable component for displaying article cards in a grid layout with category filtering, loading states, and responsive design. Used for Case Files, Signals, and Daughters of Dissent sections.

features.name: Article Detail Page
features.description: Renders individual article content with markdown support, scroll progress indicator, category badges, and metadata display.

features.name: Case Files API
features.description: API endpoint that fetches case file articles from Supabase using a preview RPC function.

features.name: Case Files Pages
features.description: Listing and detail pages for case file articles with category filtering and markdown rendering.

features.name: Signals API
features.description: API endpoint that fetches signal articles from Supabase using a preview RPC function.

features.name: Signals Pages
features.description: Listing and detail pages for signal articles with category filtering and markdown rendering.

features.name: Daughters of Dissent API
features.description: API endpoint that fetches Daughters of Dissent articles from Supabase using a preview RPC function.

features.name: Daughters of Dissent Pages
features.description: Listing and detail pages for Daughters of Dissent articles with category filtering and markdown rendering.

features.name: Hall of Noise API
features.description: API endpoint for fetching audio file metadata from Supabase storage and database, with public URL generation.

features.name: Hall of Noise Page
features.description: Coming soon page with animated background elements and links to other sections.

features.name: Admin Authentication API
features.description: Password-based authentication endpoint for admin panel access using bcrypt.

features.name: Admin Data Management API
features.description: Protected CRUD API endpoints for managing articles in dod, casefiles, and signals tables with authentication middleware.

features.name: Admin Hall of Noise API
features.description: Protected API for managing audio file uploads to Supabase storage and metadata in the hall_of_noise table.

features.name: Admin Panel
features.description: Protected admin dashboard with authentication, table switching, CRUD operations for articles, and file upload for Hall of Noise.

features.name: Home Page
features.description: Landing page with hero section, background image, and navigation to main sections.

features.name: Sponsors Page
features.description: Displays team member and sponsor cards with animations and responsive grid layout.

features.name: Theme Provider
features.description: Next-themes integration for dark mode support with system preference detection.

features.name: Scroll Progress Component
features.description: Displays a progress bar that tracks scroll position on article pages.

features.name: Button Component
features.description: Reusable button component with multiple variants built on Radix UI slot.

features.name: Navigation Menu Component
features.description: Radix UI based navigation menu primitives for accessible navigation.

features.name: Utility Functions
features.description: Utility functions including cn (className merger) and normalizeCategories for category data processing.

features.name: Noise Animation Component
features.description: Animated noise effect component with CSS animations for visual effects.

features.name: Clips Component
features.description: Component for displaying video or audio clips.

features.name: Root Layout
features.description: Main application layout with global font configuration, theme provider integration, and navigation wrapper.

features.name: Supabase Database Integration
features.description: Database queries and mutations using Supabase client for articles (dod, casefiles, signals) and audio files (hall_of_noise), with RPC functions for preview queries.

features.name: Category Filtering System
features.description: Client-side category filtering with AND logic for multiple selections, used across article listing pages.

features.name: Markdown Rendering
features.description: Custom markdown rendering with styled components for headings, paragraphs, lists, code blocks, tables, and images using react-markdown and remark-gfm.

features.name: Animation System
features.description: Framer Motion based animations including page transitions, card reveals, scroll effects, and mobile menu animations with reduced motion support.

features.name: Responsive Design System
features.description: Mobile-first responsive design with breakpoints for mobile, tablet, and desktop views, including different layouts for navigation and article grids.
